# Conceptual Model


For assignment one you will create a conceptual model to be presented in class. You will work in groups of 3-4.



1. Identify an environmental problem that would benefit from a model. 



2. Summarize the goal of the model in a few sentences. 



3. Design a conceptual model, consider -  inputs, outputs, important processes/mechanisms/interactions, reservoirs/stores, other intermediate variables or steps, relationships between variables. Put your conceptual model on a single slide and be prepared to present the key inputs and outputs of the model, and the purpose of the model in class



Also add the slide and paragraph on Gauchospace - as Group Assignment

You will need to complete the Group Select task first



Due end of the day on Monday
